ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId!='00ej0000000tMiv', TEXT(Applied_to_Account__c)='No', OR(ISCHANGED(Amount__c)=true, ISCHANGED(Account__c)=true, ISCHANGED(Check_Number__c), ISCHANGED(Applied_to_Account__c), ISCHANGED(Name) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Paper Checks cannot be modified after they've been applied to an Account.
